price: Sila odoo duraan dilooytee, balleessitoota irraa taatee jirtuu amma (amantaa)!
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
